title: Lemon & Garlic Wild Rice Soup
directions: Heat the olive oil in a large pot or dutch oven. Add the onion, carrots, celery, and garlic and saute until the carrots start to soften, about 5 minutes. Add the seasonings and zest and cook another 2 - 3 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 cup white onion , about 1/2 a medium onion
1 tablespoon lemon zest , from 1 large lemon
1 cup fresh spinach or kale , optional
